name: Slim-Fit Button-Down Collar Cotton Oxford Shirt in White
description: True to an Oxford shirt style, the soft blue Greenwich long-sleeve is crafted with two-ply cotton for durability and structure. Its slim fit shape is fastened with a button-front closure and a button-down collar. Two-ply cotton. Soft-wash finish. Button-down collar. Patch pocket. Long sleeves. Buttoned cuffs. Slim fit.
